kannada_original: ತೊಡು ಈಗ ಹೊಸ ತೊಡುಗೆ ; ಇಡು ಬೇಗ ನವ ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ
english_transliteration: Toḍu īga hosa toḍuge; iḍu bēga nava hejje
english_translation: Wear new attire now; quickly take new steps
Cast off the hundred old layers (Pares) that are not needed.

kannada_original: ನೀ ನಿಂತ ನೆಲೆಯಿಂದ ರವಿತಾರೆ ಹೊಸ ನೋಟ ;
english_transliteration: Nī ninta neleyinda ravitāre hosa nōṭa;
english_translation: From the ground where you stand, the sun and stars offer a new view;
This is what I see, just like the eye (sees)! – Muddu Rama.
